# Aggelos Rentals - LLM Context File
# Car Rental in Piraeus, Athens, Greece

> This file provides context for LLMs and AI assistants about Aggelos Rentals car rental business.

## Business Overview

**Company:** Aggelos Rentals
**Type:** Car Rental Agency
**Location:** Piraeus, Athens, Greece
**Phone:** +30 698 015 1068
**Email:** piraeus@aggelosrentals.com
**Website:** https://aggelosrentals.com

## Services

### Daily Rental
- Fiat Panda Hybrid 2023: €35/day
- Jeep Renegade 4x4: €80/day
- Mercedes-Benz A-Class: €150/day

### Monthly Rental
- Fiat Panda Hybrid 2023: €350/month
- Jeep Renegade 4x4: €800/month
- Mercedes-Benz A-Class: €1200/month

All monthly rentals include:
- Full insurance
- 2000-3000 km per month
- 24/7 support
- Free delivery to Piraeus Port or Athens Airport

## Key Features
- No credit card required (accept cash and debit cards)
- Free delivery to Piraeus Port in 20-30 minutes
- Free delivery to Athens Airport
- 24/7 Greek phone support
- 10+ years experience
- 500+ satisfied customers
- 4.8/5 rating (238 reviews)

## Delivery Locations
1. Piraeus Port (Gates E5-E7)
2. Athens International Airport (Eleftherios Venizelos)
3. Athens City Center
4. Any location in Attica region

## Languages
- Greek (default)
- English

## Operating Hours
24 hours, 7 days a week

## Contact for Bookings
- Phone: +30 698 015 1068
- WhatsApp: +30 698 015 1068
- Email: piraeus@aggelosrentals.com
